description.displayText: I don't always write reviews but Stasha is very great person, that shows initiative, she's always reliable and willing to adjust, be it to schedule, or adapting to any changes ,situations or duties. She's always punctual and seems to begin each day fully refreshed with a smile. She is just overall a positive person that contributes consistently a high quality work . She was really great with my mom, and it takes a lot to take care of my mom.
